content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetOrigin path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/delivery/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/origins/{origin_id} content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name originid
desc an origin id
in path
required true
schema
type str
sum get an origin
responses
200
deliverygetoriginresponse
type obj
schemadeliveryorigin
type obj
props
id
type str
desc an origins unique identifier
stackid
type str
desc the stack for which the origin belongs to
dedicated
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not an origin is dedicated to a cdn site

dedicated origins cannot be used by any site other than that to which it is dedicated
siteid
type str
desc the id of the cdn site to which an origin is dedicated
deliveryhttporigin
type obj
props
path
type str
desc the origins http request path
hostname
type str
desc the origins http request hostname
port
type integer
format int32
desc the origins http request port

set this to 0 to remove this value
secureport
type integer
format int32
desc the origins https request port

set this to 0 to remove this value
deliveryoriginauthentication
type obj
props
deliverybasicauthentication
type obj
props
username
type str
desc the username to be used when authenticating with the origin
password
type str
desc the password to be used when authenticating with the origin
desc basic http authentication
deliverys3authentication
type obj
props
accesskey
type str
desc the access key
secretkey
type str
desc the secret key
desc secret key authentication
desc an origins authentication method
verifycertificate
type bool
format bool
desc verify the origins ssl certificate when requesting from the origin
certificatecommonname
type str
desc the commonname to validate ssl origin requests from this value needs to be provided when enabling verifycertificate
desc an http origin
deliverystackpathstorageorigin
type obj
props
bucketname
type str
desc the origin buckets name
bucketregion
type str
desc the origin buckets region

type obj
props
deliverybasicauthentication
type obj
props

type str
desc the username to be used when authenticating with the origin
password
type str
desc the password to be used when authenticating with the origin
desc basic http authentication

type obj
props
accesskey
type str
desc the access key
secretkey
type str
desc the secret key
desc secret key authentication
desc an origins authentication method
desc a stackpath storage bucket origin
deliveryawss3origin
type obj
props
bucketname
type str
desc the origin buckets name
bucketregion
type str
desc the origin buckets region

type obj
props

type obj
props

type str
desc the username to be used when authenticating with the origin
password

desc the password to be used when authenticating with the origin
desc basic http authentication

type obj

desc the access key
secretkey

desc the secret key

desc an origins authentication method
desc an aws s3 bucket origin
deliverygooglestorageorigin
type obj
bucketname
type str
desc the origin buckets name
desc a google storage bucket origin
desc a cdn sites origin

origins are the original sources of the data that is cached by the cdn on request
desc the response with the requested origin
